title: Hitting 1000th win in ARAM.
body:
I hope this is the right board for this, but is it possible to get it with a Rioter to join me for it or are we not doing that anymore?

Cuz if we aren't it's cool and all, it's just that no one told me. :)

replies.body: Respect. I only have 700 wins in ARAM so far =/
